title: Vibrant Venture
description: When an intergalactic thief robs the arcane Power Crystals, it’s up to Cardinal, Azura, Banana and Pistachio to work together as one being to save the daycAs you run, jump , and slide your way through colorful levels, you’ll have to combine each character’s unique abilities to traverse the challenging terrain in your way Clear wide pits by double jumping as Cardinal, then swap to Azura to dash across, or climb up a wall as Banana, then gracefully glide over the abyss as Pistachio.
